description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync PA242W - 24.1" - LED-Backlit LCD Monitor
Featuring a cutting edge GB-R LED-backlight, the PA242W, a 24" AH-IPS LCD monitor, is the another standard for color accurate applications including photography and video editing. Offering an accurate 100% coverage of sRGB color gamut and 99.3% of Adobe RGB, the PA242W includes internal 14-bit 3D programmable lookup tables (LUTs) for accurate color rendition, 10-bit DisplayPort and HDMI connectivity for the highest color fidelity and built-in USB hub with DisplaySync Pro.
